Feature.Name: Shiftweave
Feature.Text: When a suit of shiftweave is created, up to five different outfits can be embedded into the cloth. By taking an action and uttering a command word, you can transform your shiftweave outfit into one the other designs contained within it.

MagicProperty.Name: Shiftweave
MagicProperty.Description: Transmutation magic is woven into the fabric of shiftweave clothing. When a suit of shiftweave is created, up to five different outfits can be embedded into the cloth. By taking an action and uttering a command word, you can transform your shiftweave outfit into one the other designs contained within it. To determine the price of a suit of shiftweave, combine the value of all the outfits it contains and add 25 gp to that amount.
